createArtifactMetadata.invocation: `cat ./service/createArtifactMetadata.sh | exec kubectl -n chaordicledger exec deploy/org1-admin-cli -c main -i -- /bin/bash`

deleteArtifactMetadata.invocation: `cat ./service/deleteArtifactMetadata.sh | sed 's|{{metadataID}}|${body}|g' | exec kubectl -n chaordicledger exec deploy/org1-admin-cli -c main -i -- /bin/bash`

getArtifact.invocation: `cat ./service/getArtifact.sh | sed 's|{{artifactID}}|${body}|g' | exec kubectl -n chaordicledger exec deploy/chaordicledger-ipfs -i -- /bin/sh`
